title: EnvrinGroup
author: EnvrinGroup
content: Strange request, but I'm blind and the bitcoin testnet faucets out there an're texactly accessible.  I managed to get 0.0001 testnet coins, but that's not enough for what I'm doing, which is alot.Does anyone by chance have some extra testnet coins on hand they can spare?  If yes and if possible, can you fire them off to: tb1qnd8uvmrvqxuhxhhucpj8yz92wugq88f4r0xqrj  Would be greatly appreciated.  Don't have anything to offer except for spending hundreds of hours in helping expand the bitcoin eco-system.Best,Matt

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: https://coinfaucet.eu/btc-testnethttps://tbtc.bitaps.comhttp://kuttler.eu/bitcoin/btc/faucet/http://bitcoinfaucet.uo1.net/Above is the list of potential lively Bitcoin Testnet Faucets. You can get some faucets from Bitcoin Wiki

comments.author: EnvrinGroup
comments.body: Thank you kind soul, whoever you are.  Appreciate it.  Got all the testnet coins I need.If you're wondering, it's because the human verification on many of the current testnet faucets isn't feasible for screen reader, hence I can't use them.Nonetheless, good to go now.  Thank you kind soul whoever sent those testnet coins.
